title: HS Code AI Classifier
context: Get AI-powered HS code classification for your products instantly

productClassification.title: Product Classification
productClassification.context: Describe your product and our AI will classify it with the appropriate HS code
productClassification.productPlaceholder: Describe your product in detail (e.g., 'Cotton t-shirts, 100% cotton, knitted, short sleeves, crew neck...')
productClassification.productTip: Tip: Provide as much detail as possible for more accurate classification including material, function, and key characteristics.
